articles.title: Building Websites in RStudio
articles.contents:
Build Website in RStudio
          
          
          Home
          Py3 tree view
          â˜°
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Building Websites in RStudio
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        Slides
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Welcome!
            Welcome! This website is a demo for the Builiding
            Websites in RStudio. Also, the site includes slides and
            additional resources to learn more about using Distill and Blogdown
            making websites in RStudio.
            
            
            Resources
            
            
            Talk presented at:
            RLadies
            Amherst and RLadies
            Baltimore in Spirng 2021.
            
            Distill
            Distill for
            R Markdown by JJ Allaire, Rich Iannone, Alison Presmanes
            Hill, Yihui Xie ORCID ID
            (Re-)introducing
            Distill for R Markdown blog post by Alison Hill and JJ
            Allaire
            M-F-E-O:
            postcards + distill blog post by Alison Hill
            postcards
            package by Sean Kross
            
            
            Blogdown
            blogdown:
            Creating Websites with R Markdown by Yihui Xie, Amber
            Thomas, Alison Hill
            Blog posts by Alison Hill
            Up
            & running with blogdown in 2021
            Unbreak
            your blogdown site
            Posts
            on Hugo
            
            
            
            
            RStudio + GitHub
            Happy git and
            GitHub for the R useR by Jenny Bryan, the STAT 545 TAs,
            Jim Hester
